scripts.clean: yes | lerna run clean && lerna clean -y && rm -rf .nx
scripts.unlink-sdk: cd packages/sdk && yarn unlink && cd ../app && yarn unlink && cd ../..
scripts.link-sdk: cd packages/sdk && yarn link && cd ../app && yarn link @cosmic-lab/prop-shop-sdk && cd ../..
scripts.rebuild:dev: yarn clean && yarn link-sdk && yarn link-drift-vaults && yarn && yarn build
scripts.setup-target: rm -rf target && mkdir target && mkdir target/deploy && mkdir target/idl
scripts.update-vaults: cp deps/drift_vaults.json target/idl/drift_vaults.json && cp deps/drift_vaults.so target/deploy/drift_vaults.so
scripts.update-drift: cp deps/drift.json target/idl/drift.json && cp deps/drift.so target/deploy/drift.so
scripts.update-pyth: cp deps/pyth.json target/idl/pyth.json && cp deps/pyth.so target/deploy/pyth.so
scripts.anchor-tests: yarn setup-target && yarn update-competitions && yarn update-vaults && yarn update-drift && yarn update-pyth && yarn test
